website_summaries.verdict: Packed with accessories and features, this patio-themed playhouse can occupy several children at a time. The sand and water table features make it a better choice for outdoor play.
pros: Open design with kitchen, grill, sink and faucet
Lidded play areas for water and sand
Large enough to fit several children
Measures 60"H x 47.5"L x 47.5"W. Strong, high-quality canopy
cons: Drains for sand and water features may not always work properly

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old and 7 year old really love it (especially the 3 year old). She could play in it for hours. Easy to put together and really efficient because kids can play both on the inside and outside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: My two year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our sons second birthday and he loves it! It was easy to put together with clear directions. We were able to assemble it when he was napping. I love that it has a canopy for the summertime when it’s so hot here. I also like that it comes with a mesh bag and hook for storing extra pieces so they don’t get lost. Would recommend to family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Eve Desselle

customer_reviews.title: So far very sturdy, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easiest set up ever! My daughter loves this thing. Luckily, we already have play grill food, since this doesn't come with any. So far very sturdy, easy to clean. My 2 year old daughter loooves to "make food" on it and loves the water and sand basins. Helpful tip - get the sand at Lowes - 50 lbs bag for like $7. Play grade and very good quality. I looked on Amazon and was extremely expensive and not too many good reviews. This is also an excellent height. She will be able to use this for years and it not be too small for her. And multiple kids and play together at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: KJ Chardonnay

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it, but requires a drill to ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, but requires a drill to insert the stabilizing screws, as there are no holes ro insert them into?! Not ideal. But held up through a gusty thunderstorm even without us using the screws. We added some string lights for evening play.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: I'd give this a 10 if I could! Love this patio
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 3 grands, 3yo and under, to keep at our home. Love it! Wanted a playhouse that wasn't closed in (so I could see if they were playing nicely), didn't want to have to sweep out spiderwebs, etc. From day one it has been very popular. I have sand in all the areas along the "walls", and the kids love climbing under as well as going in and out of the doors. It is great for them to have space to play either inside the patio or standing on the outside. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: jib

customer_reviews.title: The girls absolutely loved it. Couldn't get away from it the second ...
customer_reviews.text: The girls absolutely loved it. Couldn't get away from it the second they saw it. It was even bigger than I thought it would be from the picture, so I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony McGirr

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Issues but Otherwise Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like the set up, I love that more than one kid can play in it at once. It’s a great option to get some shade during the summer without being cooped up in a hot little fully enclosed Playhouse. However, none of the holes for the provided screws were made you will need a drill to get through the plastic and well position the provided screws. Aside from the assembly issues, this is a great product. Particularly, the canopy is very well-made, very high-quality, stays in place and stands up to wind, and children!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kirschenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Fun for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this little playhouse has a canopy because it really makes it feel like a "house", yet more spacious. My kids enjoy all the kitchen accessories it came with, and especially love the water play. My only warning to parents of active kids, my kids try to use this as jungle gym by climbing on top of the counters and sitting in the water. Gives me a fright but at least they are having fun! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Missing half of the parts@
customer_reviews.text: My package was ordered early but was put away for xmas. We went to put it together and half of the parts are missing been trying to contact manufacture no luck so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome..just a tad difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I do love this patio. Took me a few hours to put this together by myself. May just be me, but the instructions could have been more clear. There aren’t any screw holes so you have to make them yourself. My fingers are pretty sore from putting the poles together. But it seems like a great little patio and my 19month old likes it so far
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alternative to a playhouse
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little outdoor play set at a great price. A piece arrived broken but they quickly replaced it with no hassle. You will need a drill since the screw holes aren’t pre-drilled, which is kind of annoying but then again, I can drill a few holes if it means a cheaper price. And actually, I ended up unscrewing the table tops and leaving them unscrewed so I could easily dump out rain water/ play water from them. They sit securely enough on their own for my kids. Two of the basins have drains too, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: epiphany101

customer_reviews.title: Great little “shelter” for this weird time!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves his little house! It arrived quickly, and I assembled it by myself in 2 hours. My son couldn’t wait for me to fill the water table or get sand for the sand container, and he immediately covered it in dirt! But I cleaned it off today, and it’s easy to clean! It’s rather large, and the canopy is great. I love that it is accessible for wheelchairs and when we are finished with this I will be donating it to a playhouse nearby. I am so glad I got this before it sold out as we can’t get out due to shelter-in-place orders during the Coronavirus pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: PA21

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your little one
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this for my 22 month old daughter, she absolutely loves this and it kept her busy for almost 2 hours!! My husband is currently deployed so I had my 7 year old daughter help me put it together and we succeeded, it took roughly 2 hours give or take but overall not too difficult to put together. The quality is really good and the accessories it comes with are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing half of the pieces
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this zero stars since it was delivered with half of the pieces missing, but a QA sheet was included verifying everything was included. The set we received was missing the entire canopy, grill pieces, instructions, and food accessories.
customer_reviews.author: DMT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome accessible playhouse!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6-year-old who has cerebral palsy and uses an electric wheelchair and a gait trainer. This playhouse is the only one that she can take her equipment into. It’s very well made and has so many fun areas to play. The only thing I wish is that the counters were at a better height for kids who do use a wheelchair. It’s fine when my daughter is standing, but if she is using her wheelchair, the counters come right at her knees. She can’t fit underneath them comfortably. I still give this item 5 stars because it’s literally the only fully accessible playhouse on the market. I would highly recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Erin H

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect because a lot of the other toys lime this ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 but bigger for his age. This was perfect because a lot of the other toys lime this he loves to play with but they aren't his size.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Oh So Fun
customer_reviews.text: What a fun outdoor set! I am not familiar with power tools but for my first time assembling anything it only took me an hour to put this together by myself...and that was with a 4 year old and a 9 month old "helping" me. It was soooo easy and the directions were very helpful. We are going to spend many hours of fun play in here!
customer_reviews.author: Amber McClure

customer_reviews.title: Plastic and canopy already fading after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The assembly wasn't terrible but it comes disassembled to the last screw. The house is cute and fits perfectly in my space but it's a lot of plastic and after 3 months of being outdoors has already faded. The canopy halos a lot protecting the kids from the sun but is also faded, there is hardly any green left, so I don't think it's going to make to the end of the first summer. Quite expensive for fading plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Samimami

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just built it a few days ago and love it! As others have mentioned there aren't pre-drilled holes. But it's not a deal breaker! Just be aware of this. I managed with brute force and my screw driver, hahaha! This would've been an easy fix if my drill hadn't been hidden away in my husband's shed though! So it's doable without a drill. But I'd recommend making sure yours isn't locked away somewhere, if only to save your thumb and fingers from some discomfort from manual assembly. :) Very happy with our purchase! As is our 2 year old! (And her 8 and 12 year old siblings.)
customer_reviews.author: Spot

customer_reviews.title: it really was simpler than most and two people (one for moral support at least) is a good idea. Worth it to see my child light ...
customer_reviews.text: You need a drill even though instructions say screwdriver. There are no actual holes in the product and I definitely got rug burn style finger injurues. However, it really was simpler than most and two people (one for moral support at least) is a good idea. Worth it to see my child light up at the end.
customer_reviews.author: kelfrag

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little play set for young kids. My 1.5year old loves it and its super sturdy and easy to assemble. Theres a little bag to hold all of the accessories, a cover for the sand box, and drains for both sides of the sink. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't look perfect, but my daughter is two and doesn't understand ...
customer_reviews.text: It's much smaller than I thought it would be. Also, the grill cover came broken. It doesn't look perfect, but my daughter is two and doesn't understand that it was broken as we tried to fix it as best we could.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime1812

customer_reviews.title: Fun for All
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Grill cover has broken off after only a couple of weeks. Playtime patio comes with a minimum of accessories. Canopy has held up well after thunderstorms and strong winds.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Tourdot

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this put door toy. It's spacious and has plenty of activities for her to do (water play, sand play, food play). She loves to cook for me as I set up a chair at the serving counter. I love that it is covered to protect her from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Warren

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely wonderful for my 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size he's on the taller side so I was worried he'd have to duck to get in but it's perfect. It arrived very early. It was in great shape and was easy to put together. I'm extremely happy with this purchase. I can't really say anything about the durability yet, as we just received it, but it seems very sturdy. I would definitely recommend this canopy playhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Our kids 1 & 2 1/2 absolutely love it. I did not put sand in the sand/water table area...only water, which give them both space to play at the water table. We’ve had it for a a week and they play everyday for an hour or more. Winner!
customer_reviews.author: Julie AC

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Kids like it and I like that there is shade... that’s really the only reason I got it. There really isn’t a whole lot to do. Quality isn’t that great for the price & piles are flimsy. Save yourself money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a win-win. Put it outside on our patio and kids can play in sun or rain because of the protective cover. Good size and up to 4 kids play in it at a fine but it is best suited for 2 kids. My 2 and 6 year old love it. It’s got great spaces for play and we use the sand and water feature plus the make believe grill blocs the accessories. Easy to assemble and my kids helped my spouse. It’s big enough but not too big that it sat on our deck. Great buy, very pleased, with the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Several missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what I wanted but several pieces are missing. Both knobs for the grill, the plastic part that holds together the top of the canopy and several screws. The screws we can replace but not the plastic pieces
customer_reviews.author: Erin F.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Since we bought this it has become a beloved play area for my kids. I bought patio flooring for under it since it's on our mulch. It was very easy to assemble and I did it all by myself in about an hour (with the "help" of a 3 and 4 year old). The canopy is great for shielding the kids from the sun while they play. The patio has held up during 2 flash floods now. I'm so glad I brought it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughters love it.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters love this and are really enjoying it. It is very new so I can't judge its durability. My husband didn't find assembling it difficult at all. It is practical because when the girls get too tall for the unit with the canopy on we'll take it off and they will be able to continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mamma

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this, I however did not
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this, I however did not. The instructions were horrible and nothing is predrilled. The sink portion could also use a drain plug. Overall, satisfied because my kids enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVED this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's 2nd birthday. Our bounce house was canceled due to weather so we set this up under the carport and the kids all played in it the ENTIRE time. Its now on my back deck and my daughter will stay and play with it for quite some time. I love that its open so you can watch what's going on and the canopy for sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: Rissa

customer_reviews.title: Fast assembly
customer_reviews.text: We put this together in maybe 15 minutes? My son is 3 and loves to pretend he's the cook in a restaurant. He also loves playing in a water and sand. It is perfect and big like I had hoped. I was going to get it last year but held off because of the price. It was on sale now so I got it. But I still wish I had gotten it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilham

customer_reviews.title: Best outside toy ever
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love this. The two year old twins play with it nearly every moment they are outside. They run right to it, even without water in it. They collect rocks, leaves, and acorns to make food. I love it. Six yo grandson loves it, 9 yo granddaughter loves it. Even the 12 yo grandson will play with the babies in it. Best outside toy ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We live in AZ so I’m not sure how this will hold up through our summers here. But so far this playhouse has been great! Kids ages 7,5,1 play in this thing at the same time. There is plenty of room for them, my 7 year old can stand up all the way in it. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: 100% worth it. Buy this. Easy to assemble, I put it together myself with no help. This thing is awesome. My daughter and her friends (ages 2 to 4) have thoroughly enjoyed this. The shade is nice. The poles don't get hot to the touch. The water table has a nice drain to it. Grill area is fun. Enough room for 3 or 4 kids to fit inside and play. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Met1129

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The bottom was easy to assemble but completely falls apart if you have to move it if it is not screwed together. It is a super cute set. The canopy seemed very complicated so we still haven’t put it up. We just use the set without it. My 2 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lali

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This patio playhouse is full of activities for the little ones. My nephews played for hours. It is sturdy, easy to wipe down. and keeps the little ones in the shade. It does not come with food for the grill. I would have paid extra for that to be included. Over all a wonderful place for children to play.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was a drain in the sink
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year-old son enjoys it. Giving four star only because wish there was a drain in the sink. It acummulates water every time it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Cordeiro

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old, and her 8/9 year old siblings love it too!! I love it and think it was worth the money. I love the openness and the covering for added shade. It’s better than them stuffing inside a closed plastic house in the 90 degree weather!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ann Foti

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 and 2 year old can both play in this for hours. We added sand and water and they loved it. We can easily hose it off at the end of the day and start new. Perfect for kids that are getting taller too! Many of the play houses had a low Ceiling that didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wynne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 4+ year old, sturdy, large, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves her new outdoor kitchen! She is 4 years old and it is the perfect size for her to move about and create all of her special meals! She can work from the outside or the inside. It was very easy to assemble, taking about 15", the tarp is sturdy so should last a while. Great product
customer_reviews.author: A. Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Fun for imaginative play
customer_reviews.text: Surprised my child with this to keep them busy outside. They love the water tables! We even put water beads in them for play. I love that they have some shade for outside. Assembly wasn’t the worst but we did have to break out the drill to help get some screws in.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P

customer_reviews.title: I swing doors are a nice touch. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 1/2 year old twin nephews. By far this exceeded my expectations. There are multiple things to play with (grill,sink etc) and enough room inside for both of them to play with something different together. I swing doors are a nice touch. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria H.

customer_reviews.title: Kid Approved
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this! And now she wants to spend more time outside "cooking". My husband and I are glad we bought this, it was money well spent in our book and super easy to put together. Also so far it has held up through all of the bad weather Southern Oklahoma has received lately.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie Luckinbill

customer_reviews.title: Wheelchair friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our daughter and her panthera micro fits perfectly. She loves it! My husband screwed it to the deck and sawed off the lip into it so it's easier for her to get in and out of independently. So exciting to find a play place she can actually enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: So I guess you’re supposed to drill your own holes for the screws? If you don’t already have a drill that does this then don’t even bother buying this. Also, our grill cover came broken so we can’t use that. Kinda let down for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: shannon o.

customer_reviews.title: You need a drill bit to put this together.
customer_reviews.text: I think my girls are going to have fun with this but assembly is a little more involved than stated. The prefabricated holes and there are many are just small markers. You can't use a screwdriver or drill to push through the screw, you need a bit. But once that's out of the way, easy peasy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our grandson LOVES his 'new house'
customer_reviews.text: The Playtime Patio was relatively easy to assemble and appears to be quite sturdy. Set up instructions are mainly visual but mostly easy to follow. I did use a cordless drill/driver to drill holes where screws are required but it is quite clear where holes should be drilled. Over all we are very happy with it and as stated above, most importantly our grandson absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: I have received defective items for waiting 3weeks
customer_reviews.text: Please DO NOT BUY THIS! I had a problem to receive this item and it took more than three weeks to receive it. But it was ok, as long as my daughter was happy when she got the package. I just tried to set up and found out that i have received DEFECTIVE ONE!!!! there is no hole at all even they came bunch of nails, missing parts., I am going to contact to seller now and will see how he will be handling this. When I had problem to receive the package, i am the one who called Amazon and Fedex every single day to solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Ji Youn Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer playhouse
customer_reviews.text: The playhouse is exactly as described. The directions were explicit and easy to follow. The children love playing in it. I did contact the seller and he was able to resolve my issue. The playhouse has already many hours of fun and entertainment for our 3 and 5 year old. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maem

customer_reviews.title: Not what I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: Not as entertaining as I'd hoped. They don't play with it unless it has water in the bins...
customer_reviews.author: CassieFaith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is big enough (tall enough AND wide enough) for all three of my kids to play together! I have a 9 yr old, a 4yr old and a 3 yr old! My only critique or suggestion is that you have a drill to assemble because they didn’t pre drill the holes that the screws go into. But it’s plenty sturdy and provides hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great little for 6 and under. I love that you can do sand and water. The only thing I wish it that the sink had a drain hole. Other then that this product is great! My daughter is 4 and is really tall and has no problem playing under the canopy. She will spend hours playing!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Seglinski

customer_reviews.title: Great product - wish had weatherproof cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this - lots of ways kids can play, not currently using the canopy because we get some windy storms in the summer and it will get ruined - wish they made a cover for the bottom as it is fully exposed to weather - currently using a tarp
customer_reviews.author: DLB

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY.... what a joke! This product has no holes for the screws! Don’t BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shade helps since we are outside and he burns easily. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this. The shade helps since we are outside and he burns easily. Good quality. I am 5 foot 2 and I can stand up in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Bill V.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to build.
customer_reviews.text: It's not rocket science lol. Easy to build, but requires a impact drill to screw the nails in to make it really study. Really hard to do it by hand with a Philips hand screwdriver. I'm sure you can build it and not put the screws in but may fall apart with strong winds.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Cool playset but missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty simple playset and the kids love it. It's nice that it has the water and sand play in addition to the pretend grill and counter. Only one problem with it though, it was missing piece "M" that connects the grill cover to the grill. That kinda sucks because it would be nice to have ALL piece functioning properly, but it isn't an essential piece. Hopefully, I can order it or find a substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Safer and closer than the park!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I have purchased for my toddler for our backyard. He loves it and spends lots of time happily playing with it. I love the canopy to protect him from the sun. It’s not bulky and fits perfect in a little spot on the patio of my back yard.
customer_reviews.author: WeekndBabeXO

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, so happy with it and my granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my granddaughter for Christmas. It was very easy to put together. This is very well constructed and a delight for her to play in. There are many details which make this a fun place for her. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CHEKMTDB

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it and good value!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Put together relatively easy. Would recommend using a hammer to start the big screws into plastic. Easier with two people but probably possible with only one. Kids couldn't stop playing as we were putting together so hoping they will get lots of fun put of it this morning. (Age 21 months and 4.5) I think this is better than a play house because can hose down the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas present for my son and nieces. They seem to love playing kitchen and store with it. It was easy to set up but only thing is I used a power drill for the nails because there weren’t nail holes already made in the plastic. I had to put the nail there and make one. Sometimes it wouldn’t go as easy. Also did this by myself no need for two people like the directions stated. Took me about an hour because I was also dealing with an 8 month old lol
customer_reviews.author: honore

customer_reviews.title: Pieces missing
customer_reviews.text: There were pieces missing. We spent some time putting it together and screwing in the pieces only to find out, part way through, pieces to hold the grill lid on were missing! We are not taking it all apart and sending it back after we already did the work screwing it together. It was a gift for my granddaughters 1st birthday and we are so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my daughter who just turned 3. She LOVES it! Can barely keep her away from it. It's actually very sturdy and it was really easy to put together but the photos in the instruction manual were kinda confusing. They definitely could have been better.. Other than that. no complaints at all. Seems to stay in place just fine, easy to move when we need to, and we always take the canopy part off in case of storms, so it doesn't blow away. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nick M.

customer_reviews.title: Great place to spend many hours of fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing fun place. Bought it for my 3 year old and she loves it. Many fun hours playing beach restaurant in our back yard. Durable, great colors and just perfect for little kids to play in for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Maria K. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 year old toddler boys!!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson loves this playhouse and plays with it all the time. It’s great for creative playing and playing make believe in preparing food. We keep it right on our deck.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly and durable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Durable. Canopy fades quickly but expected that in the Florida sun. Water does get trapped inside some of the pieces. Grandbaby loves it.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old son and he loves it. Wasn't too hard to put together. It is a little bit wobbly. Would also be nice if there was a hole drilled into the sink to drain the water. Had to make one. Have to still dump out even for the double sided part.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bell

customer_reviews.title: This has been fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Oh how the kids love this! It’s a nice open play space with sun protection. Great for 2-3 little ones at a time. And who doesn’t love water play? Our youngest is 3 and 2. Sometime our 6 year old sun will play with them.
customer_reviews.author: jhlynngirl

customer_reviews.title: Still standing strong
customer_reviews.text: It handles the desert wind like a champ. It was kind of a pain to build and the way the canopy fits to the plastic is stupid. But it still looks new. Kids still like to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: P. BENNETT

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My girls love it. My hubby put it together in about 20 minutes and they play with it regularly for about an hour at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old LOVES it. Easy to put together. You will have to make your own holes in the plastic to screw the screws in however. My boyfriend used a hammer to push the screw through the plastic, then screwed it in the rest of the way with an electric drill gun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is a super fun and cute play house. I was worried it would be too short but my very tall 6 year old (almost 50 inches) can even stand and play in it without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D

customer_reviews.title: Survived downpours lately
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandsons to play on the backyard. It is really cool with a stove to cook on. The boys are really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: diane edwards

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Me and my kids put this together, the instructions are a little hard to understand because they're all pictures but the kids knew what to do . The only thing I didn't expect is for how many screws are needed there are no holes. Be prepared to screw into plastic. It did make it a little more difficult but overall it wasn't terrible. Once finished, this thing is fricking awesome! Even my 12 and 14 are playing in it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful I'm glad i bought it.
customer_reviews.text: We have this outside. Grandchildren love it. Made well. Will last a long time. Really keeps their interest. Lots to play with.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: NIIIIIIICE
customer_reviews.text: I hope my daughter loves this as much as I do. Well-constructed and easy to put together. Enough activities to keep little ones busy. Like a playhouse, but open, but shaded. And easy to deconstruct ad store for winter.
customer_reviews.author: LYDIA

customer_reviews.title: Didnt disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this, not difficult to assemble and lightweight to move around. Great for young kids. My only complaint is that there should be a drain in the sink area
customer_reviews.author: BlessedMommy2

customer_reviews.title: get it
customer_reviews.text: love love love it. super easy and quick to put together I did it myself. kid loves it, gives her some shade on the deck. I also store her bike underneath it at night in case it rains or whatever. good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lay

customer_reviews.title: Great patio set for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew and his parents love it. I loved the Sun shade so his little head dosent get burnt. He loves the water table and sand put.
customer_reviews.author: Jody jones

customer_reviews.title: Summer bbq play set
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much ! My kids cannot stop play with it . I got this for my backyard , so kids can pretend do their BbQ . My kids and daycare play cook game together . Such a good idea to have this in the back yard .
customer_reviews.author: Anita Kisca Shien

customer_reviews.title: Toddler fun
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my one year old grandson.It is the perfect height.Fun pretend things to do.Wish it came with a set of stools.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie D.

customer_reviews.title: my 2yo and 6yo absolutely love it! A word to the wise though
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described.. my 2yo and 6yo absolutely love it! A word to the wise though, skip the sand and make them both water tables. It's too small and too close together and just makes a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love it
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it, I like that they are in the shade and the bag for them to put all the little toy cooking parts in.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Hard to put together, had to use actual tools to put together bc u have to make ur own holes for the screws
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for grandkids in and out
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandkids 2 and 5 and they love it. I move inside and outside as the weather dictates. Even the roof is easy to put on or off s needed. Kids use with water when outside - but with play food inside equally fun.
customer_reviews.author: scaff101

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor AND indoor use!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little set. We had it outdoor in our backyard, and eventually moved it indoors during the harsh Phoenix summer, and my kids loved playing in it and climbing all over it. It is really sturdy and easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: D Wright

customer_reviews.title: Best Spring Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME. I got it for my 19 month old and it's perfect. I put together most of it and the neighbor did the canopy for me so that I could entertain my son elsewhere. I wish it had predrilled holes but it wasn't too pad. We used a flat head to pop a hole and then screwed the screws in. I'm truly excited to see him play with this more and more. It's SO CUTE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pain to put together but kids loved it once up
customer_reviews.text: Pain to put together but kids loved it once up. You need 2 people and still took 4 hours. A bit expensive for the value. But it's good quality and the kids are having fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K Drago

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect purchase. My Granddaughter loves this playset as well as all the other kids who've come to play
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Mann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son for his 3rd birthday and he absolutely loved it. Took less than 45 mins to put together and pretty sturdy. It came with accessory bag that just had cups, plates etc but no food for him took cook. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great with many different functionality’s
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. You get so many different features with this. The only complaint is that the instructions didn’t specify which directions the poles go so I had to use some WD40 to get them out and turned back around.
customer_reviews.author: Mando

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it and it's very durable. It was blown across my yard during high winds and nothing was broken and the canopy was still intact. I was pleasantly surprised. Most storms do not cause it to move.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My three year old can play in this for hours and the tent awning helps keep it cool in hot weather and doesn't allow as much dirt to get into the toys. Does not include play sand.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this costume service is great as I was putting it together I realized the grill top was broke they sent me a new one no problem within a week It’s definitely not meant to be moved once you put it together it fell apart on me as the screws are only on the plastic
customer_reviews.author: MCP

customer_reviews.title: Great set but missing a piece.
customer_reviews.text: Cute little set but when my husband I put it together one of the pieces was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. So fun for the kids. Have 3y/o and 1 y/o (got this for her birthday). They play in it every time we go outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This was relatively easy to assemble. I watched a youtube video by the manufacturer before I started and that was very helpful. I was not able to push in a couple plastic parts (for example the hook to hold up the mesh bag), but that doesn't impact the quality of the product. My niece loves playing in this play house.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

product_meta.title: Step2 All Around Playtime Patio with Canopy Playhouse, Model:874100
product_meta.description: The Step2 All Around Playtime Patio with Canopy has it all for the ultimate backyard party! Realistic stacked stone and market-style canopy features make this outdoor playhouse a grilling and snacking oasis – with a bonus sand and water station! Kids can get creative with pretend play in the open pavilion design, large enough for friends to play together at once. When playtime fun is done, store the included accessories in the mesh bag and put the cover on the sand and water table to keep the sand fresh for the next cookout!
feature_bullets: This pavilion-style outdoor playhouse design lets kids get ready to host their own backyard party! Ideal for social and interactive play, the working doors open to let kids in and out to play with the included kitchen and sand & water features.

Grill with friends and enjoy the meal at the snack table, all while comfortable in the shade of the overhead canopy! Afterward, use the molded-in play sink to wash the dishes and place them in the storage bag to keep them handy for next time.

Friends can play in the sand and water area while they wait for dinner to be served! Several accessories are included for splish-splash fun and sand exploration, like the water tower, scoops, and double-sided shovel.
This kids’ outdoor playhouse features realistic stacked stone and a neutral color palette for an attractive design that blends perfectly into any backyard.
In the box: Open pavilion-style playhouse including play grill, snack table, water table, sand cover, canopy, 16-piece accessory set with mesh accessory bag.
